subject: Package
description_text: I had paid extra for express shipping (2-5 buisness days) it’s the end of the 7th day and shows my package hasn’t left the facility in CA. Furthermore, when I look at my shipping detail on fedexs website it says standard shipping. Upsetting to say the least.

conversations.body_text: Hi Brandon Wight,     We apologize for the inconvenience. We've checked your shipment status, which was updated on the evening of the 13th. Delivery is expected around the 14th. Below is your tracking link:     https://t.17track.net/en#nums=887653059017
